hCalendar 2 - multiple occurrence test

This page was design to test that values of a hCalendar which are meant to have multiple occurrences are parsed correctly.

From: hCalendar test suite 1.0

Author: Glenn Jones

Tests:

Test Result Comment
vevent[0].category[1] IsEqualToCaseInsensitive("Unconference") The category is a multiple value
vevent[0].rrule[0].freq IsEqualTo("yearly") The rdate is a singular value
vevent[0].rdate[0].freq IsEqualTo("2001-06-01/2001-08-29/2002-06-05/2002-08-30") The rdate is a singular value
vevent[0].attendee[0] HasProperty(true) The attendee is a singular value

History:

  • Created: 2 June 2008 by Glenn Jones

Barcamp Brighton 1

8 - 9 September 2007
